code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 4'b0000; // Reset state
    end else begin
        if (q == 4'b1111) begin
            q <= 4'b0000; // Wrap around
        end else begin
            q <= q + 1; // Increment
        end
    end
end

endmodule
